opinions.text:
ORDER
The defendant’s motion for limited remand as prayed is denied.

attorneys: Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Stephen Lichatin III, Spec. Asst. Atty. Gen., for plaintiff.
John A. MacFadyen III, Chief Appellate Defender, Providence, for defendant.
casebody.head_matter:
STATE v. Thomas INNIS.
No. 75-333-C.A.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Aug. 28, 1980.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Stephen Lichatin III, Spec. Asst. Atty. Gen., for plaintiff.
John A. MacFadyen III, Chief Appellate Defender, Providence, for defendant.
